FuncDef: The clear alarm active command clears active alarms. The clear alarm active command clears active alarms.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the sequence number of an alarm.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4294967295.

ExtraInfo: To quickly clear an alarm generated for a fault that is rectified, run this command. You can run the display alarm active command to view the alarms of the current device.
